class.name: TextParagraph
class.description: Abstraction over [TextServer] for handling a single paragraph of text.

method.name: add_object
method.description: Adds inline object to the text buffer, [param key] must be unique. In the text, object is represented as [param length] object replacement characters.

method.name: add_string
method.description: Adds text span and font to draw it.

method.name: clear
method.description: Clears text paragraph (removes text and inline objects).

method.name: clear_dropcap
method.description: Removes dropcap.

method.name: draw
method.description: Draw all lines of the text and drop cap into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: draw_dropcap
method.description: Draw drop cap into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: draw_dropcap_outline
method.description: Draw drop cap outline into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: draw_line
method.description: Draw single line of text into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: draw_line_outline
method.description: Draw outline of the single line of text into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: draw_outline
method.description: Draw outlines of all lines of the text and drop cap into a canvas item at a given position, with [param color]. [param pos] specifies the top left corner of the bounding box.

method.name: get_dropcap_lines
method.description: Returns number of lines used by dropcap.

method.name: get_dropcap_rid
method.description: Returns drop cap text buffer RID.

method.name: get_dropcap_size
method.description: Returns drop cap bounding box size.

method.name: get_line_ascent
method.description: Returns the text line ascent (number of pixels above the baseline for horizontal layout or to the left of baseline for vertical).

method.name: get_line_count
method.description: Returns number of lines in the paragraph.

method.name: get_line_descent
method.description: Returns the text line descent (number of pixels below the baseline for horizontal layout or to the right of baseline for vertical).

method.name: get_line_object_rect
method.description: Returns bounding rectangle of the inline object.

method.name: get_line_objects
method.description: Returns array of inline objects in the line.

method.name: get_line_range
method.description: Returns character range of the line.

method.name: get_line_rid
method.description: Returns TextServer line buffer RID.

method.name: get_line_size
method.description: Returns size of the bounding box of the line of text.

method.name: get_line_underline_position
method.description: Returns pixel offset of the underline below the baseline.

method.name: get_line_underline_thickness
method.description: Returns thickness of the underline.

method.name: get_line_width
method.description: Returns width (for horizontal layout) or height (for vertical) of the line of text.

method.name: get_non_wrapped_size
method.description: Returns the size of the bounding box of the paragraph, without line breaks.

method.name: get_rid
method.description: Returns TextServer full string buffer RID.

method.name: get_size
method.description: Returns the size of the bounding box of the paragraph.

method.name: hit_test
method.description: Returns caret character offset at the specified coordinates. This function always returns a valid position.

method.name: resize_object
method.description: Sets new size and alignment of embedded object.

method.name: set_bidi_override
method.description: Overrides BiDi for the structured text. Override ranges should cover full source text without overlaps. BiDi algorithm will be used on each range separately.

method.name: set_dropcap
method.description: Sets drop cap, overrides previously set drop cap. Drop cap (dropped capital) is a decorative element at the beginning of a paragraph that is larger than the rest of the text.

method.name: tab_align
method.description: Aligns paragraph to the given tab-stops.
